div.p: Please click image for all COVID-19 School Closure Resources and Updates

div.div: The Staff at the Hayward Community School District have put together videos to let our students know how much we miss them! Please click here to see those videos:
div.a: Read More about We Miss You!! #HurricaneStrong

div.div: The 2020-2021 regular open enrollment application period is February 3, 2020 - May 29, 2020 at 4:00p.m.
div.a: Read More about 2020-2021 Open Enrollment Application Period

div.div: HCFS is pleased to announce the continuation of the Food 4 Kids Program (F4K) through the 2020 summer. Extra food for kids will be available directly at the Hayward Community Food Shelf. There is NO COST to the parent or child for this program. Here are the details:
div.a: Read More about FOOD 4 KIDS — SUMMER PROGRAM

a.title: A list of contacts for each building in the district

span.style: font-size: 15pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84);

p.span: Our mission is simple, "ACHIEVE." It is expected that all of our students, staff, parents, and community members ACHIEVE at the highest level possible. It is our job to provide the tools to make this mission a reality. We feel that the school and the community must work together in order to ACHIEVE our goals.
